snippet: Dyson's innovative and pricey vacuum cleaners shared an Achilles' heel with even the most plebeian vacuums: tangling hair. But its new Tangle-free Turbine tool is made to handle the task.
abstract: Dyson's innovative and pricey vacuum cleaners shared an Achilles' heel with even the most plebeian vacuums: tangling hair. But its new Tangle-free Turbine tool is made to handle the task.

headline.main: A Vacuum That Promises No More Tangles
headline.print_headline: A Vacuum Tool That Promises No More Tangles
